review: easy to install.  I had it working in 5 minutes.  I can see all of the amazon prime shows and netflicks and even play some games.very happy with purchase
author: Alida F.

review: Compact and effective.  Movies, TV, Music and my pictures.... unbelievable. Love it !
author: Jeanne

review: Installation is easy.not much better than Google chromecast,  after taking advantage of the free 90 day trial of prime I found that there was extra charge for the tv programs that I wanted to watch. I use it for Netflix and it is faster than chromecast.
author: Rocky Pyrdeck

review: I've had a few different streaming devices, and so far this one is my favourite by far- and a killer deal as well. Definitely recommend-
author: ira

review: Forget Hulu, Netflix and all the others...This is the BEST of the best!
author: Joseph M. Motes

review: Works very nice is a little tricky to learn to use. But can learn it in time.
author: William Podbreger
